name: Autonomous Drive Car Parking Mania – Parking Game
name_original: Autonomous Drive Car Parking Mania – Parking Game
description:
Have you experienced the unusual, thrilling sensation of riding in the driver’s seat of an autonomous drive car as it navigated the streets of big city? Once you’ve experienced a car that drives itself, you will feel like you have stepped into the future. You will quickly get comfortable as the car smoothly and safely negotiated the suburban streets, including intersections and dense traffic. You just need to set the destination, put the car in autonomous drive mode and go off without a hitch. You can go on both the freeway and city streets; there will be time when other drivers cut in on you, but you will never feel threatened. Each time the car anticipated the other car’s move and reacted appropriately.

Cars that can change lanes on their own, negotiate city streets and handle the drudgery of stop-and-go traffic are now reality and you can take a ride without pedal the metal and just sit behind the wheels. Imagine if you could get back this time to make yourself more productive by taking part in a video conference, checking your email or to just relax by watching a favorite entertainment program.

Game Features:
* Anticipated the other car’s move and reacted appropriately
* Take a ride without pedal the metal
* Just sit behind the wheels and it will take you to the destination
* Amazing modern city environment.
* HD graphics and stunning car sound effects
* Different Camera View
